About Us

Lazr is the most-complete transportation platform out there bringing added value to all supply chain actors is our mission.

Welcome to inclusive logistics where everyone wins.

Our business model is unique in many ways. First and foremost, in order to be a platform, one has to create value for all parties. In our case this means bringing the much needed tools to the supply chain actors. Welcome to the future of logistics and good news, it is awesome!

Our team is strong of a solid experience in the transportation and logistics sector. And we have found that things can be done better, provided with the right tools, the user is empowered. Sure, logistics can be complicated, there are a lot of things to know and you are basically left to yourself in a trial and error process that can be costly. Not with Lazr.

It takes years to become a master in logistics. Using our platform transfroms the user into an expert instantly, you will be able to navigate pricing, booking, documentation and data like a pro in no time while impressing your colleagues with the results.

Our Services

Lazr becomes your supply team command center

Over the road


Our pricing engine is simply unique. You will get instant pricing from all major carriers. That is a feat itself. Lazr pushes this perk further by offering the offer of thousands of partner-carriers and 3PL's in the mix. This is the most complete offer you can get.

Inter-modal


Our goal is to add value to your supply-chain, this means getting the right option for your moves, every time. In order to accomplish this, we now offer a unique approach to Inter-Modal transportation (rail+trucking). Our engine create service combinations you will not fin elsewhere.

Custom Logistics


Our inclusive approach puts you in contact with logistics specialist who are happy to provide the custom solutions you need. Instead of looking all over the place to find your options, Lazr does it all, you get all levels of service within the same app and dashboards.

Specialized cargo


With the help of our specialist-partners, there is no limit to the size order you can add to your Lazr account. We manags wide-loads, oversized cargo and overweight cargo with the same ease we do all other shipments. Put our experts to the test.

Data management


We are all about making your logistics needs easier. Getting the level of control and oversight on your transportation operations to the next level really feels good. Our command center makes you avoid unnecessary fees and our KPI create profit. Boom!

Documentation & EDI communication

If someone were to say you will never need to fill-out a BOL ever again, you can either call them a liar, or log-in to your Lazr account and live this dream. Also, our platform organizes, places and supplies all documentation for every shipment, never lose a document again.
